verses.verse: שָׁמוֹר֙ <WH8104> sha-mOr Observe אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- חֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> Cho-desh the month הָאָבִ֔יב <WH24> ha-'a-Viv, of Abib וְעָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta and keep פֶּ֔סַח <WH6453> Pe-sach, the passover לַיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֑יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha; thy God כִּ֞י <WH3588> ki in בְּחֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH2320> be-Cho-desh for in the month הָֽאָבִ֗יב <WH24> ha-'a-Viv, of Abib הוֹצִ֨יאֲךָ֜ <WH3318> ho-Tzi-'a-cha brought thee forth יְהוָ֧ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֛יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God מִמִּצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim out of Egypt לָֽיְלָה׃ <WH3915> La-ye-lah. by night

וְזָבַ֥חְתָּ <WH2076> ve-za-Vach-ta Thou shalt therefore sacrifice פֶּ֛סַח <WH6453> Pe-sach the passover לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God צֹ֣אן <WH6629> tzon of the flock וּבָקָ֑ר <WH1241> u-va-Kar; and the herd בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> bam-ma-kOm in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, which the LORD לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo his name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham. in it

לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- shall not תֹאכַ֤ל <WH398> to-Chal Thou shalt eat עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> 'a-Lav and חָמֵ֔ץ <WH2557> cha-Metz, no leavened bread שִׁבְעַ֥ת <WH7651> shiv-'At with it seven יָמִ֛ים <WH3117> ya-Mim days תֹּֽאכַל־ <WH398> to-chal- shalt thou eat עָלָ֥יו <WH5921> 'a-Lav with מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot unleavened bread לֶ֣חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem therewith [even] the bread עֹ֑נִי <WH6040> 'O-ni; of affliction כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki in בְחִפָּז֗וֹן <WH2649> ve-chip-pa-Zon, in haste יָצָ֙אתָ֙ <WH3318> ya-Tza-ta for thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> le-Ma-'an that תִּזְכֹּ֗ר <WH2142> tiz-Kor, that thou mayest remember אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- י֤וֹם <WH3117> Yom the day צֵֽאתְךָ֙ <WH3318> tze-te-Cha when thou camest forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of Egypt כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> kol all יְמֵ֥י <WH3117> ye-Mei] all the days חַיֶּֽיךָ׃ <WH2416> chai-Yei-cha.] of thy life

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- no יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> ye-ra-'Eh seen לְךָ֥ le-Cha שְׂאֹ֛ר <WH7603> se-'Or And there shall be no leavened bread בְּכָל־ <WH3605> be-chol all גְּבֻלְךָ֖ <WH1366> ge-vul-Cha with thee in all thy coast שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- and none יָלִ֣ין <WH3885> ya-Lin remain מִן־ <WH4480> min- at הַבָּשָׂ֗ר <WH1320> hab-ba-Sar, neither shall there [any thing] of the flesh אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> tiz-Bach which thou sacrificedst בָּעֶ֛רֶב <WH6153> ba-'E-rev at even בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom day הָרִאשׁ֖וֹן <WH7223> ha-ri-Shon the first לַבֹּֽקֶר׃ <WH1242> lab-Bo-ker. all night until the morning

לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo are not תוּכַ֖ל <WH3201> tu-Chal Thou mayest לִזְבֹּ֣חַ <WH2076> liz-Bo-ach not sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפָּ֑סַח <WH6453> hap-Pa-sach; the passover בְּאַחַ֣ד <WH259> be-'a-Chad within any שְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> she-'a-Rei-cha, of thy gates אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God נֹתֵ֥ן <WH5414> no-Ten giveth לָֽךְ׃ Lach.

כִּ֠י <WH3588> ki for אִֽם־ <WH518> 'im- lo אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about הַמָּק֞וֹם <WH4725> ham-ma-Kom But at the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- after יִבְחַ֨ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֣ן <WH7931> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֔וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo, his name שָׁ֛ם <WH8033> sham in it תִּזְבַּ֥ח <WH2076> tiz-Bach in there thou shalt sacrifice אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַפֶּ֖סַח <WH6453> hap-Pe-sach the passover בָּעָ֑רֶב <WH6153> ba-'A-rev; at even כְּב֣וֹא <WH935> ke-Vo at the going down הַשֶּׁ֔מֶשׁ <WH8121> hash-She-mesh, of the sun מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> mo-'Ed at the season צֵֽאתְךָ֥ <WH3318> tze-te-Cha that thou camest forth מִמִּצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mi-mitz-Ra-yim. out of Egypt

וּבִשַּׁלְתָּ֙ <WH1310> u-vish-shal-Ta And thou shalt roast וְאָ֣כַלְתָּ֔ <WH398> ve-'A-chal-ta, and eat בַּמָּק֕וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom [it] in the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God בּ֑וֹ bo; וּפָנִ֣יתָ <WH6437> u-fa-Ni-ta and thou shalt turn בַבֹּ֔קֶר <WH1242> vab-Bo-ker, in the morning וְהָלַכְתָּ֖ <WH1980> ve-ha-lach-Ta and go לְאֹהָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH168> le-'o-ha-Lei-cha. unto thy tents

שֵׁ֥שֶׁת <WH8337> She-shet Six יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> ya-Mim days תֹּאכַ֣ל <WH398> to-Chal thou shalt eat מַצּ֑וֹת <WH4682> matz-Tzot; unleavened bread וּבַיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> u-vai-Yom day הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗י <WH7637> hash-she-vi-'I, and on the seventh עֲצֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH6116> 'a-Tze-ret [shall be] a solemn assembly לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh to the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo no תַעֲשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh thou shalt do מְלָאכָֽה׃ <WH4399> me-la-Chah. no work ס sa-Mek

שִׁבְעָ֥ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah Seven שָׁבֻעֹ֖ת <WH7620> sha-vu-'Ot weeks תִּסְפָּר־ <WH5608> tis-por- shalt thou number לָ֑ךְ Lach; מֵהָחֵ֤ל <WH2490> me-ha-Chel unto thee begin חֶרְמֵשׁ֙ <WH2770> cher-Mesh [to put] the sickle בַּקָּמָ֔ה <WH7054> bak-ka-Mah, to the corn תָּחֵ֣ל <WH2490> ta-Chel from [such time as] thou beginnest לִסְפֹּ֔ר <WH5608> lis-Por, to number שִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> shiv-'Ah the seven שָׁבֻעֽוֹת׃ <WH7620> sha-vu-'ot. weeks

וְעָשִׂ֜יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta And thou shalt keep חַ֤ג <WH2282> chag the feast שָׁבֻעוֹת֙ <WH7620> sha-vu-'Ot of weeks לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God מִסַּ֛ת <WH4530> mis-Sat with a tribute נִדְבַ֥ת <WH5071> nid-Vat of a freewill offering יָדְךָ֖ <WH3027> ya-de-Cha of thine hand אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which תִּתֵּ֑ן <WH5414> tit-Ten; which thou shalt give כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher which יְבָרֶכְךָ֖ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha hath blessed יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [unto the LORD thy God] according as the LORD אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha. thy God

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֞ <WH8055> ve-sa-mach-Ta And thou shalt rejoice לִפְנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֣ <WH1121> u-vin-Cha thou and thy son וּבִתֶּךָ֮ <WH1323> u-vit-te-Cha and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> ve-'av-de-Cha and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶךָ֒ <WH519> va-'a-ma-te-Cha and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִי֙ <WH3881> ve-hal-le-Vi and the Levite אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בִּשְׁעָרֶ֔יךָ <WH8179> bish-'a-Rei-cha, that [is] within thy gates וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> ve-hag-Ger and the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> ve-hai-ya-Tom and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> ve-ha-'al-ma-Nah and the widow אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּקִרְבֶּ֑ךָ <WH7130> be-kir-Be-cha; that [are] among בַּמָּק֗וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom, you in the place אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who יִבְחַר֙ <WH977> yiv-Char hath chosen יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God לְשַׁכֵּ֥ן <WH7931> le-shak-Ken to place שְׁמ֖וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo] his name שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> Sham.] in it

וְזָ֣כַרְתָּ֔ <WH2142> ve-Za-char-ta, And thou shalt remember כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for עֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> 'E-ved that thou wast a bondman הָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ta become בְּמִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> be-mitz-Ra-yim; in Egypt וְשָׁמַרְתָּ֣ <WH8104> ve-sha-mar-Ta and thou shalt observe וְעָשִׂ֔יתָ <WH6213> ve-'a-Si-ta, and do אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽחֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> ha-chuk-Kim these statutes הָאֵֽלֶּה׃ <WH428> ha-'El-leh. these פ Peh

חַ֧ג <WH2282> chag the feast הַסֻּכֹּ֛ת <WH5521> has-suk-Kot of tabernacles תַּעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> ta-'a-Seh Thou shalt observe לְךָ֖ le-Cha שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> shiv-'At seven יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> ya-Mim; days בְּאָ֨סְפְּךָ֔ <WH622> be-'A-se-pe-cha, after that thou hast gathered מִֽגָּרְנְךָ֖ <WH1637> mig-ga-re-ne-Cha in thy corn וּמִיִּקְבֶֽךָ׃ <WH3342> u-mi-yik-Ve-cha. and thy wine

וְשָׂמַחְתָּ֖ <WH8055> ve-sa-mach-Ta And thou shalt rejoice בְּחַגֶּ֑ךָ <WH2282> be-chag-Ge-cha; in thy feast אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> 'at-Tah you וּבִנְךָ֤ <WH1121> u-vin-Cha thou and thy son וּבִתֶּ֙ךָ֙ <WH1323> u-vit-Te-cha and thy daughter וְעַבְדְּךָ֣ <WH5650> ve-'av-de-Cha and thy manservant וַאֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> va-'a-ma-Te-cha, and thy maidservant וְהַלֵּוִ֗י <WH3881> ve-hal-le-Vi, and the Levite וְהַגֵּ֛ר <WH1616> ve-hag-Ger the stranger וְהַיָּת֥וֹם <WH3490> ve-hai-ya-Tom and the fatherless וְהָאַלְמָנָ֖ה <WH490> ve-ha-'al-ma-Nah and the widow אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בִּשְׁעָרֶֽיךָ׃ <WH8179> bish-'a-Rei-cha. that [are] within thy gates

שִׁבְעַ֣ת <WH7651> shiv-'At Seven יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> ya-Mim, days תָּחֹג֙ <WH2287> ta-Chog shalt thou keep a solemn feast לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בַּמָּק֖וֹם <WH4725> bam-ma-Kom in the place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which יִבְחַ֣ר <WH977> yiv-Char shall choose יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; which the LORD כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki because יְבָרֶכְךָ֞ <WH1288> ye-va-rech-Cha shall bless יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh because the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בְּכֹ֤ל <WH3605> be-Chol all תְּבוּאָֽתְךָ֙ <WH8393> te-vu-'a-te-Cha thee in all thine increase וּבְכֹל֙ <WH3605> u-ve-Chol all מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma-'a-Seh and in all the works יָדֶ֔יךָ <WH3027> ya-Dei-cha, of thine hands וְהָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ta become אַ֥ךְ <WH389> 'ach you will be altogether שָׂמֵֽחַ׃ <WH8056> sa-Me-ach. therefore thou shalt surely rejoice

שָׁל֣וֹשׁ <WH7969> sha-Loosh Three פְּעָמִ֣ים׀ <WH6471> pe-'a-Mim times בַּשָּׁנָ֡ה <WH8141> bash-sha-Nah in a year יֵרָאֶ֨ה <WH7200> ye-ra-'Eh appear כָל־ <WH3605> chol all זְכוּרְךָ֜ <WH2138> ze-chu-re-Cha shall all thy males אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֣י׀ <WH6440> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֗יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha, thy God בַּמָּקוֹם֙ <WH4725> bam-ma-kOm in the place אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which יִבְחָ֔ר <WH977> yiv-Char, which he shall choose בְּחַ֧ג <WH2282> be-Chag in the feast הַמַּצּ֛וֹת <WH4682> ham-matz-Tzot of unleavened bread וּבְחַ֥ג <WH2282> u-ve-Chag and in the feast הַשָּׁבֻע֖וֹת <WH7620> hash-sha-vu-'ot of weeks וּבְחַ֣ג <WH2282> u-ve-Chag and in the feast הַסֻּכּ֑וֹת <WH5521> has-suk-Kot; of tabernacles וְלֹ֧א <WH3808> ve-Lo shall not יֵרָאֶ֛ה <WH7200> ye-ra-'Eh and they shall not appear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD רֵיקָֽם׃ <WH7387> rei-Kam. empty

אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish Every man כְּמַתְּנַ֣ת <WH4979> ke-mat-te-Nat shall give יָד֑וֹ <WH3027> ya-Do; is able כְּבִרְכַּ֛ת <WH1293> ke-vir-Kat according to the blessing יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah-weh of the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei-cha thy God אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָֽתַן־ <WH5414> na-tan- which he hath given לָֽךְ׃ Lach. ס sa-Mek
